NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PLUME: The jellyfish have been visiting the surface of Giant's Deep more and more frequently, and staying for unprecedented lengths of time. 2 1 PLUME: In the absence of those on the expedition to the Quantum Moon, I must investigate the cause of this phenomenon on my own. 3 1 PLUME: An update: I have been unable to note any significant changes in the planet's conditions that could be causing this phenomenon.. But I believe I have a hypothesis at last. 4 3 PLUME: Coleus, Melorae and Thatch have been using the rule of quantum imaging to keep the Quantum Moon locked in superposition during their expeditions. 5 4 PLUME: From their reports, we know that the Quantum Moon exerts gravity on its visitors. This means that it exerts a gravitational pull on the objects around it. 6 5 PLUME: Hypothesis: Could the Quantum Moon's gravity be causing the jellyfish to rise to the surface as it orbits Giant's Deep? 7 6 PLUME: The jellyfishes' water-composed bodies would cause them to feel the effects of gravity more strongly, after all. 8 6 PLUME: Hypothesis confirmed! Hypothesis confirmed! My friends, we have found the secret to the jellyfishes' behavior at last! LCJ EX1 1 LCJ EX2 5 LCJ EX3 7
